channel.title: Pre-caching your TFS Proxy
channel.description: The Team Foundation Server Version Control Proxy is a wonderful thing - despite the not so catchy name.  It sits between a remote office and your Team Foundation Server Application Tier and caches requests for file downloads from that...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Adrian+00:00
item.description:

Adrian

item.title: Comment by Mayur+00:00
item.description: Greetings Martin, I have done pre catching thing half way as per your article. Created new workspace and folder mappings.It was done successsfully. Configured my TFS server with TFS proxy. Run the script. Now it is catching from tfs main server.Not from proxy. It is giving error as follow: TF15013:the requested team foundation server is not registerd with proxy server. I have restarted my main server but again same error. Could you plz help me in solving this error? Regards, Mayur Bondre
item.dc:creator: Mayur
